response.headline: Korean skincare clinic recommendations and treatment experience at Heyday Clinic
response.summary: Hannah Yoo shares 4 tips for choosing Korean skincare clinics, recommending @Heydayclinic_en for their accommodating consultation and budget-friendly approach. She received rejuran, neobeam laser, Juvelook, and Potenza treatments, noting that rejuran is particularly painful but effective.

location_tags: Gangnam-gu, 14.8K people posted about this place

extracted_text: 4 tips on how to pick a Korean Skincare Clinic with my personal recommendation @Heydayclinic_en!!!
This was the first time I felt truly comfortable during the consultation
She was super accommodating and really tried to help me get the best results within my budget
Got rejuran + neobeam laser + Juvelook + Potenza
(THO I MUST SAY REJURAN HURTS CRAZY)
image_details.key_interest: Personal recommendation for Korean skincare clinic with specific treatment details
